code: import React,{useState}from"react";import logo from"./logo.svg";import"./App.css";import{Login}from"./login";import{Register}from"./register";import{Chatbot}from"./chatbot";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[currentForm,setCurrentForm]=useState("login");const[isLoggedIn,setIsLoggedIn]=useState(false);const toggleForm=formName=>{setCurrentForm(formName);};const handleLoginSuccess=()=>{setIsLoggedIn(true);};const handleLogout=()=>{setIsLoggedIn(false);};return _jsx("div",{className:"App",children:!isLoggedIn?currentForm==="login"?_jsx(Login,{onFormSwitch:toggleForm,onLoginSuccess:handleLoginSuccess}):_jsx(Register,{onFormSwitch:toggleForm}):_jsx(Chatbot,{handleLogout:handleLogout})});}export default App;
